text:
Hi everybody! I'm Paolo, PhD student in theoretical physics. My research is focused on Quantum Machine Learning, and I've recently picked up Julia for its "Yao" QML library.
Hope you're all good in these tough times, and I look forward to learning from you (and maybe helping once I've caught up)!

text: You should check out Zapata Computing - they are looking for interns :slightly_smiling_face:
